first_para: William James Clappison, commonly known as James Clappison, (born 14 September 1956) is a British barrister and Conservative Party politician. He serves as Vice Chairman of the Conservative Friends of Israel group.

full.extract: William James Clappison, commonly known as James Clappison, (born 14 September 1956) is a British barrister and Conservative Party politician. He serves as Vice Chairman of the Conservative Friends of Israel group.
full.title: James Clappison
